attributes.action: Make St George's Day a National Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most countries get a National Holiday on their patron saints day, even america and canada take st patricks day off, and that's Ireland's patron saint!!! People would be much more patritic if they could take the day to remember their saint.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
